title: Link the Orc - Novel Updates
tags: Game Elements   Gods   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Orcs   Parallel Worlds   Wars

description:
At morning, he’s an ordinary Korean boy, HanSang.

“This is Grackar’s Strength.'

Hansang acquires Grackar’s strength

“This is not the one I acquired…”

Grackar acquires HanSang’s strength.

The two, yet one, are linked>
